field.name: set_itemid
field.query: SELECT id as value, CONCAT_WS(' - ', menutype,title) AS text FROM #__menu WHERE link LIKE '%option=com_contactenhanced%' AND published=1 ORDER BY menutype ASC, title ASC
field.label: COM_CONTACTENHANCED_FIELD_SETITEMID_LABEL

field.name: title-modal
field.label: Modal Options
field.description: These options below are the default Modal options, however they can be overridden by the modal_template, modal_width and modal_height syntax options

field.name: plg_display_type
field.label: Display type
field.description: Whether to set the default display mode to Modal Window (Lightbox/Squeezebox style) instead of the embedded form

field.name: plg_display_text
field.label: Text
field.description: Text to that will display when display type is set to modal

field.name: template
field.label: Use Template
field.description: Some templates set a width to the content container, therefore you can choose another template. Recommended in these cases is beez5
